(:03) (Shotgun) 9-M.Stafford pass deep left to 81-C.Johnson to GB 33 for 30 yards. FUMBLES, RECOVERED by GB-22-J.McMillian at GB 33. 22-J.McMillian to GB 36 for 3 yards (87-B.Pettigrew). Johnson's attempted lateral was recovered by GB.
